Articles.Content:
I am having Camera problems again

the problem is that after a certain distance up the camera starts to move down away from the middle of the craft

Please follow [this](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92229-How-To-Get-Support-%28READ-FIRST%29) when asking for support

You have given us pretty much nothing to go on. I have experienced this kind of bug before but with out knowing what mods you have installed when exactly it happens, does it happen only to specific craft etc. then there is no way any of us can help you. Most importantly is the output\_log when this is happening.

here is my mod list

[http://prntscr.com/6cw5f6](http://prntscr.com/6cw5f6)

and its not crashing so how would i get an output log
Try reading the link Akira\_R gave you: [thread=92229]How to Get Support[/thread]. Among other things, it will tell you where your logs are located.

Ok here is the output log

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/nj8lh18mwejpgxy/output_log.txt?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/nj8lh18mwejpgxy/output_log.txt?dl=0)
So does the log say anything

There are quite a few exceptions. The most likely reason is that KSP is installed on the Desktop, leading to permissions issues. Try copying and pasting (not moving) your KSP\_win folder to someplace with normal permissions like C:\Games\.
Ok i will move the whole folder to /games
Ok i moved it but the problem is still happening and it happens at 6k meters

Moved, or copied and pasted? Moving it keeps the same broken permissions.

Otherwise, you'll have to narrow it down a bit. Can you reproduce the issue with just one or two mods installed?
so i should copy and paste it then

> 
> so i should copy and paste it then

To quote Master Tao's post......

" **Try copying and pasting (not moving)** your KSP\_win folder to someplace with normal permissions like C:\Games\."

Yes Copy and Paste it to a new location.....

Lol i totally read over that

edit just realized i did copy and paste it to the new location and it didnt help

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-07T06:18:54Z" title="03/07/2015 06:18  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 7, 2015</time> by Trem Fantasma**
